summary.span: 表示存储在 Oracle 服务器上的大型对象二进制 () 数据类型。

span.span: Represents a large object binary () data type stored on an Oracle server.

summary.span: 将数据从指定的 追加到当前 。

span.span: Appends data from the specified to the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要写入到`LOB`，必须在检索`LOB`using FOR UPDATE 子句中的 SQL SELECT 语句，并且您必须有启动的本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. 源中的所有数据`LOB`追加到当前末尾`LOB`。All data from the source `LOB` is appended to the end of the current `LOB`. 位置既不`LOB`计算也没有在此过程中更改。The position of neither `LOB` is evaluated or changed during this process. 在基础数据类型始终必须相同。The underlying data types must always be the same. 例如，如果将从追加，目标还必须是。For example, if you are appending from an , the destination must also be an . > [!NOTE] > 在此版本中，对只读的写入操作`LOB`可能会成功，但不会更新`LOB`在服务器上。In this release, a write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server. 在这种情况下，但是，在本地复制的`LOB`更新。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated. 因此，更高版本上读取操作对象可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation.

span.span: The source is null.

exception.span: 源 为 null，或者连接已关闭。

span.span: The source is null, or the connection is closed.

exception.span: 源 对象已关闭或已释放。

span.span: The source object was closed or disposed.
An Oracle error has occurred.

summary.span: 在执行多个写操作时避免服务器端触发器激发。

span.span: Prevents server-side triggers from firing while performing multiple write operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void BeginBatch() cil managed

summary.span: 在执行多个读操作时避免服务器端触发器激发。

span.span: Prevents server-side triggers from firing while performing multiple read operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此时将打开`LOB`中模式; 因此，`LOB`只能读取，不会写入，到相应的调用直到。Opens the `LOB` in mode; therefore, the `LOB` can only be read from, not written to, until the corresponding call to . 若要执行批处理写入`LOB`，调用与。To perform batch writes to the `LOB`, call with . 调用不止一次在同一事务中的当前引发 Oracle"ORA 22293:LOB 已在同一事务中打开"时出错。Calling more than one time within the same transaction currently throws the Oracle "ORA-22293: LOB already opened in the same transaction" error. 此外，如果您获得`LOB`使用另一个，且不会调用原始调用方具有生成方法，同样的错误。In addition, if you obtain the `LOB` using another , and the original caller has not called the method, the same error is generated. 因此，您必须调用方法完成后使用。Therefore, you must call the method when you are finished using the .

span.span: The connection is closed.
The object was closed or disposed.
An Oracle error has occurred.

summary.span: 在以指定的访问模式执行多个读写操作时避免服务器端触发器激发。

span.span: Prevents server-side triggers from firing while performing multiple read and write operations in the specified access mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要写入到`LOB`，必须在检索`LOB`using FOR UPDATE 子句中的 SQL SELECT 语句，并且您必须有启动的本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. 调用不止一次在同一事务中的当前引发 Oracle"ORA 22293:LOB 已在同一事务中打开"时出错。Calling more than one time within the same transaction currently throws the Oracle "ORA-22293: LOB already opened in the same transaction" error. 此外，如果您获得`LOB`使用另一个，且不会调用原始调用方具有生成方法，同样的错误。In addition, if you obtain the `LOB` using another , and the original caller has not called the method, the same error is generated. 因此，您必须调用方法完成后使用。Therefore, you must call the method when you are finished using the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要写入到`LOB`，必须在检索`LOB`使用 FOR UPDATE 子句中的 SQL SELECT 语句，并且您必须已启动对本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have started a local transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChunkSize As Integer
public: property int ChunkSize { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示读/写操作过程中要从服务器检索或发送到服务器的最小字节数。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the minimum number of bytes to retrieve from or send to the server during a read/write operation.

value.span: 要检索或发送的最小字节数。

span.span: The minimum number of bytes to retrieve or send.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值属性不是适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序的设置。The value returned by the property is not a setting of the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle. 相反，它是与服务器通信时使用 Oracle 调用接口 (OCI) 的值。Instead, it is the value that the Oracle Call Interface (OCI) uses when communicating with the server. 使用以确保客户端的区块大小相同。Use to ensure that client-side chunks are the same size. 读取或写入更小的块不会缓存数据，并将导致无优化往返于服务器，因为完整数据包都不接收或发送。Reading or writing in smaller chunks does not cache data, and causes a less-optimized round trip to the server, because a full packet is not received or sent.

summary.span: 创建一个新 对象，该对象与原始 对象引用相同的 Oracle 。

span.span: Creates a new object that references the same Oracle as the original object.

returns.span: 一个与原始 对象引用相同 Oracle 的新 对象。

span.span: A new object that references the same Oracle as the original object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新属性对象最初具有与原始对象相同的值。The properties of the new object initially have the same values as those of the original object. 但是之后,每个已完成，对象是相互独立。However, after the is complete, each object is independent from the other. 例如，更改的值原始属性的值不更改副本。For example, changing the value of the property on the original does not change the value of on the copy.

param.name: destination
param.span: 目标 。

span.span: The destination .

summary.span: 从该 复制到目标 。

span.span: Copies from this to a destination .
The number of bytes copied.

returns.span: 这排除了所有已填充的字节。

span.span: This excludes any padded bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在基础数据类型始终必须相同。The underlying data types must always be the same. 例如，如果要从复制，目标还必须是。For example, if you are copying from an , the destination must also be an . 目标偏移量是否超出目标末尾`LOB`，则`LOB`扩展到其复制数据。If the destination offset is beyond the end of destination `LOB`, the `LOB` to which the data is being copied is extended. 末尾之间的间距`LOB`用零填充超出末尾位置的目标偏移量`BLOB`数据类型，以空格`CLOB`和`NCLOB`数据类型。The space between the end of the `LOB` and the destination offset beyond the end is padded with zeros for `BLOB` data types and spaces for `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types. 要写入到`LOB`，必须在检索`LOB`using FOR UPDATE 子句中的 SQL SELECT 语句，并且您必须有启动的本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. > [!NOTE] > 在此版本中，对只读的写入操作`LOB`可能会成功，但不是更新`LOB`在服务器上。In this release, a write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but not update the `LOB` on the server. 在这种情况下，但是，在本地复制的`LOB`将更新。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` will be updated. 因此，更高版本上读取操作对象可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation. > > `CopyTo`方法并不会清除目标内容`OracleLob`之前执行复制操作。The `CopyTo` method does not clear the contents of the destination `OracleLob` before performing the copy operation.

exception.span: 参数中指定的 为 null。

span.span: The specified in the parameter is null.

exception.span: 该操作未处在事务中， 对象为 null，或者连接已关闭。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在基础数据类型始终必须相同。The underlying data types must always be the same. 例如，如果要从复制，目标还必须是。For example, if you are copying from an , the destination must also be an . 目标偏移量是否超出目标末尾`LOB`，则`LOB`扩展到其复制数据。If the destination offset is beyond the end of destination `LOB`, the `LOB` to which the data is being copied is extended. 末尾之间的间距`LOB`用零填充目标超出末尾位置的偏移量`BLOB`数据类型，以空格`CLOB`和`NCLOB`数据类型。The space between the end of `LOB` and destination offset beyond the end is padded with zeros for `BLOB` data types and spaces for `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types. 要写入到`LOB`，必须在检索`LOB`using FOR UPDATE 子句中的 SQL SELECT 语句，并且您必须有启动的本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. > [!NOTE] > 在此版本中，对只读的写入操作`LOB`可能会成功，但不会更新`LOB`在服务器上。In this release, a write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server. 在这种情况下，但是，在本地复制的`LOB`更新。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated. 因此，更高版本上读取操作对象可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation. > > `CopyTo`方法并不会清除目标内容`OracleLob`之前执行复制操作。The `CopyTo` method does not clear the contents of the destination `OracleLob` before performing the copy operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int64 Erase() cil managed

summary.span: 从该 清除所有数据。

span.span: Erases all data from this .
The number of bytes erased.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会截断数据。 does not truncate data. `LOB`长度始终相同`BLOB`数据类型，并清除的数据，会替换为 0x00。The `LOB` length remains the same for a `BLOB` data type, and the erased data is replaced by 0x00. `CLOB` 和`NCLOB`数据类型替换为空格。`CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types are replaced by spaces. 要写入到`LOB`，必须在检索`LOB`using FOR UPDATE 子句中的 SQL SELECT 语句，并且您必须有启动的本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. > [!NOTE] > 在此版本中，对只读的写入操作`LOB`可能会成功，但不会更新`LOB`在服务器上。In this release, a write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server. 在这种情况下，但是，在本地复制的`LOB`更新。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated. 因此，更高版本上读取操作对象可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation.

Public Function Erase (offset As Long, amount As Long) As Long
public: long Erase(long offset, long amount);

param.name: offset
param.span: 要从中清除的偏移量。

span.span: The offset from which to erase.

param.span: 对于 和 数据类型，它必须为偶数。

span.span: For and data types, this must be an even number.

param.name: amount
param.span: 要清除的数据数量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The quantity of data, in bytes, to erase.

param.span: 对于 和 数据类型，它必须为偶数。

span.span: For and data types, this must be an even number.

summary.span: 从该 清除指定数量的数据。

span.span: Erases the specified amount of data from this .
The number of bytes erased.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的值的总和`offset`并`amount`参数可以是大于的大小。The sum of the values in the `offset` and `amount` parameters can be greater than that of the size of the . 因此，指定的值比返回的大属性将成功; 但是只会删除到末尾。Therefore, specifying a value greater than that returned by the property succeeds; however only erases to the end of the . (同样，如果是负数值传递给`offset`，将会成功，但仅擦除的从头开始启动。)此行为是不同的并方法和产品/服务的优点是能够擦除所有数据值指定`offset`而无需进行一次附加往返到服务器后，若要验证的实际大小。(Similarly, if a negative value is passed to `offset`, will succeed, but only erase starting from the beginning of the .) This behavior is different from that of the and methods, and offers the advantage of being able to erase all data from the value specified by `offset` without making an additional roundtrip to the server to verify the actual size. 不会截断数据。 does not truncate data. `LOB`长度始终相同`BLOB`数据类型，并清除的数据，会替换为 0x00。The `LOB` length remains the same for a `BLOB` data type, and the erased data is replaced by 0x00. `CLOB` 和`NCLOB`数据类型替换为空格。`CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types are replaced by spaces. 要写入到`LOB`，必须在检索`LOB`using FOR UPDATE 子句中的 SQL SELECT 语句，并且您必须有启动的本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. > [!NOTE] > 在此版本中，对只读的写入操作`LOB`可能会成功，但不会更新`LOB`在服务器上。In this release, a write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server. 在这种情况下，但是，在本地复制的`LOB`更新。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated. 因此，更高版本上读取操作对象可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation.

exception.span: 该操作未处在事务中， 对象为 null，或者连接已关闭。

span.span: The operation is not within a transaction, the object is null, or the connection is closed.
The object was closed or disposed.
An Oracle error has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能是下列任一数据类型。An may be one of the following data types. |OracleType 数据类型OracleType data type|描述Description| |--------------------------|-----------------| |`Blob`|包含二进制数据的 Oracle `BLOB` 数据类型，其最大大小为 4 GB。An Oracle `BLOB` data type that contains binary data with a maximum size of 4 gigabytes. 它映射到 类型的 。This maps to an of type .| |`Clob`|包含字符数据的 Oracle `CLOB` 数据类型，根据服务器的默认字符集，其最大大小为 4 GB。An Oracle `CLOB` data type that contains character data, based on the default character set on the server, with a maximum size of 4 gigabytes. 它映射到 。This maps to .| |`NClob`|Oracle`NCLOB`基于最大大小为 4 千兆字节在服务器上的区域字符集包含字符数据的数据类型。An Oracle `NCLOB` data type that contains character data, based on the national character set on the server with a maximum size of 4 gigabytes. 它映射到 。This maps to .|

span.span: Represents a null object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以构造值为 NULL，使用此格式：You can construct an that is NULL using this format: ``` OracleLob myLob = OracleLOB.Null; ``` 此方法主要用于测试是否`LOB`从服务器返回为 NULL，如本示例所示：This technique is used primarily to test whether a `LOB` returned from the server is NULL, as this example illustrates: ``` If(myLob == OracleLob.Null) ``` 为空`LOB`的行为类似于零字节`LOB`在于成功并始终返回零字节。A NULL `LOB` behaves similarly to a zero byte `LOB` in that succeeds and always returns zero bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 流必须支持查找要获取或设置位置。The stream must support seeking to get or set the position. 使用属性来确定该流是否支持查找。Use the property to determine whether the stream supports seeking. 支持查找到流的长度超出任何位置。Seeking to any location beyond the length of the stream is supported. 查找到的异常位置`CLOB`和`NCLOB`还支持数据类型。Seeking to an odd position for `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types is also supported. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分的属性。For more information, see the Remarks section of the property. 属性不会不跟踪的和 / 或已使用，跳过，该流中的字节数。The property does not keep track of the number of bytes from the stream that have been consumed, skipped, or both.

param.name: buffer
param.span: 字节数组。

span.span: An array of bytes.

param.span: 当此方法返回时，此缓冲区包含指定的字符数组，此数组中 和 ( + ) 之间的值被从当前源中读取的字节所替换。

span.span: When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between and ( + ) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.

returns.span: 读入缓冲区中的总字节数。

span.span: This may be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.

MemberSignature.Value: public override long Seek (long offset, System.IO.SeekOrigin origin);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int64 Seek(int64 offset, valuetype System.IO.SeekOrigin origin) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Seek (offset As Long, origin As SeekOrigin) As Long
public: override long Seek(long offset, System::IO::SeekOrigin origin);

param.name: offset
param.span: 相对于 origin 的字节偏移量。

span.span: A byte offset relative to origin.

param.span: 如果 为负，则新位置位于 指定的位置之前 指定的字节数。

span.span: If is negative, the new position precedes the position specified by by the number of bytes specified by .

param.span: 如果 为零，则新位置是 指定的位置。

span.span: If is zero, the new position is the position specified by .

param.span: 如果 为正，则新位置位于 指定的位置之后 指定的字节数。

span.span: If is positive, the new position follows the position specified by by the number of bytes specified by .

param.name: origin
param.span: 类型的值，指示用于获取新位置的参考点。

span.span: A value of type indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.

summary.span: 在当前 流上设置位置。

span.span: Sets the position on the current stream.
The new position within the current stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`offset`为负，则新位置必须位于指定的位置`origin`按指定的字节数`offset`。If `offset` is negative, the new position must precede the position specified by `origin` by the number of bytes specified by `offset`. 如果`offset`为零，则新位置必须是指定的位置`origin`。If `offset` is zero, the new position must be the position specified by `origin`. 如果`offset`为正，则新位置必须遵循指定的位置`origin`按指定的字节数`offset`。If `offset` is positive, the new position must follow the position specified by `origin` by the number of bytes specified by `offset`. 支持查找到流的长度超出任何位置。Seeking to any location beyond the length of the stream is supported. 查找到的异常位置`CLOB`和`NCLOB`还支持数据类型。Seeking to an odd position for `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types is also supported. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分的属性。For more information, see the Remarks section of the property.

span.span: The parameter does not contain a valid value.

exception.span: 结果位置在值的长度之外。

span.span: The resulting position is beyond the length of the value.
The object was closed or disposed.
An Oracle error has occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetLength(int64 value) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub SetLength (value As Long)

param.name: value
param.span: 所需的当前 流的长度（以字节表示）。

span.span: The desired length of the current stream in bytes.

param.span: 对于 和 数据类型，它必须为偶数。

span.span: For and data types, this must be an even number.

summary.span: 将 流的长度设置为小于当前长度的值。

span.span: Sets the length of the stream to a value less than the current length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尝试增加的长度流失败，并返回"消息：ORA 22926： 指定剪裁长度大于当前 LOB 值的长度"Oracle 服务器。An attempt to increase the length of the stream fails, and returns "Message: ORA-22926: specified trim length is greater than current LOB value's length" from the Oracle server. 流必须支持写入和查找有关函数。A stream must support both writing and seeking for to function. 适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序处理所有`CLOB`和`NCLOB`以 unicode 格式的数据。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle handles all `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data as Unicode. 因此，访问时`CLOB`和`NCLOB`数据类型，您始终处理的字节，其中每个字符是 2 个字节数。Therefore, when accessing `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types, you are always dealing with the number of bytes, where each character is 2 bytes. 例如，如果包含三个字符的文本的字符串将保存为`NCLOB`上的 Oracle 服务器，其中的字符集是每个字符，4 个字节，则执行`SetLength`操作，指定字符串的长度为 6 个字节，尽管它是存储为在服务器上的 12 个字节。For example, if a string of text containing three characters is saved as an `NCLOB` on an Oracle server where the character set is 4 bytes per character, and you perform a `SetLength` operation, you specify the length of the string as 6 bytes, although it is stored as 12 bytes on the server. 要写入到`LOB`，必须在检索`LOB`using FOR UPDATE 子句中的 SQL SELECT 语句，并且您必须有启动的本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. > [!NOTE] > 一个只读的写入操作`LOB`可能会成功，但不会更新`LOB`在服务器上。A write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server. 在这种情况下，但是，在本地复制的`LOB`更新。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated. 因此，更高版本上读取操作对象可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation.

exception.span: 参数中为 或 数据类型指定的值不是偶数。

span.span: A value specified in the parameter for a or data type is not even.
-or-

exception.span: 参数中指定的值小于零，或大于 4 GB。

span.span: A value specified in the parameter is less than zero or greater than 4 gigabytes.

exception.span: 该操作未处在事务中， 对象为 null，或者连接已关闭。

For and , a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关数据类型连续类型的数组的形式返回整个基础数据`Byte[]`。For data types, returns the entire underlying data as a contiguous array of type `Byte[]`. 有关并数据类型返回所有数据作为`String`数据类型。For and data types, returns all the data as a `String` data type. 对于 null 数据返回。For null data, returns . 通过比较返回的值，你可以区分出空数据、 为 null 数据和数据。By comparing the returned values, you can distinguish among empty data, null data, and data. > [!NOTE] > 使用的好处是`LOB`数据类型是能够检索大量客户端在区块中的数据。A benefit of using `LOB` data types is the capability to retrieve large amounts of data in chunks at the client. 但是，使用，获取有关的所有数据`LOB`列作为一个连续的区块，可以显著提高应用程序开销。However, when you use , you obtain all the data for the `LOB` column as one contiguous chunk, which can significantly increase application overhead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteByte(unsigned int8 value) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub WriteByte (value As Byte)

param.name: value
param.span: 要写入流中的字节。

span.span: The byte to write to the stream.

summary.span: 将一个字节写入 流内的当前位置，并将流内的位置向前推进一个字节。

span.span: Writes a byte to the current position in the stream, and advances the position within the stream by one byte.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果写入操作成功，流中的位置向前推进一个字节。If the write operation is successful, the position within the stream advances by one byte. 如果发生异常，则流中的位置保持不变。If an exception occurs, the position within the stream remains unchanged. 编写结尾之外`LOB`允许和放大`LOB`1 个字节。Writing beyond the end of the `LOB` is allowed and enlarges the `LOB` by one byte. 要写入到`LOB`，必须在检索`LOB`using FOR UPDATE 子句中的 SQL SELECT 语句，并且您必须有启动的本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. > [!NOTE] > 一个只读的写入操作`LOB`可能会成功，但不会更新`LOB`在服务器上。A write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server. 在这种情况下，但是，在本地复制的`LOB`更新。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated. 因此，更高版本上读取操作对象可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation.
